    • Method Detail

      • getAgentBaseName

        public java.lang.String getAgentBaseName(java.lang.String entityName)
        An agent can be given a name in two ways. Either the agent takes the name from the entity it connects to. Or it uses the name can either be a name provided in the launch. Given the suggested name by the environment this method will return the desired name.
        Parameters:
        entityName - The suggested name.
        Returns:
        the desired name for the agent.

      • takesAgentNameFromEnvironment

        public boolean takesAgentNameFromEnvironment()
        Returns:
        true if the agent takes the name from the entity provided by the environment.

      • getAgentBaseName

        public java.lang.String getAgentBaseName()
        Returns:
        the agent suggested by the by launch rule or null when the agent takes the name from the entity it will be connected to.
